version_description:
《绝园少女》更新啦！(/≧▽≦/)
作为全球首款二次元MMO游戏，《绝园少女》将给您带来前所未有的沉浸式游戏体验，让您尽享被二次元小姐姐们追捧的快感。马上进入指挥官大本营，体验最新游戏内容吧！
1.城防驻守功能上线，具体规则可以在学院围墙的界面进行查询。
2.雨宫奈奈可以在生存战里出战了
3.通过主界面的列表可以快速进入生存战
4.新增了雨宫奈奈的约会主线剧情
5.修复了竞技场战报携带世界坐标的问题
6.修正了竞技场战报的其他若干问题
7.修复了竞技场提示出征已达上线的问题

Zgirls Updated!
As the first global ACGN MMO game, Zgirls will bring you an unprecedented immersive game experience by letting you date with different girls and lead your girl students to fight against enemies. Enter the game right now and experience the latest game contents!(/≧▽≦/)
1.Added random orange equipment in obsidian store
2.Added self-defined using function of active skills
3.Added new troops skin in arena store
4.Fixed the problem of battle reports showing the school defense damage reduce of attacking part
5.Mio and Hiyori can join survival battle
6.Optimized the skill effect of Gin and Saki in survival battle

更新：

BUG修复
1.修复团购奖励领取BUG
2.修复战斗中机甲会直接使敌方部队死亡的问题

Zgirls Updated!
As the first global ACGN MMO game, Zgirls will bring you an unprecedented immersive game experience by letting you date with different girls and lead your girl students to fight against enemies. Enter the game right now and experience the latest game contents!(/≧▽≦/)
1. Appointment feature is available. Some buildings can be appointed with an enabler to gain extra buffs.
2. Fixed the display problem of Lv.6 graduation mail.
3. Optimized the guide of tech-research. You can jump to the former tech when you tap a tech that can’t be researched because of requirements not met.
4. Fixed the bug of invalid dead attack after activating the star language of Regulus.
5. Fixed the compatibility problem in newbie guide on pad.

《絕園少女》更新啦！ (/≧▽≦/)

1.冠军对决模式部分服务器开放
2.王者对决模式内，商店新增Mirai套装碎片兑换

Zgirls Updated!
As the first global ACGN MMO game, Zgirls will bring you an unprecedented immersive game experience by letting you date with different girls and lead your girl students to fight against enemies. Enter the game right now and experience the latest game contents!(/≧▽≦/)
1.Dressed the spring skin to school again.
2.Has the possibility to get wandering students to supplement your power while gathering the resources on the world map

4.Optimized the experience of Survival Battle interaction and opened a new chapter of Survival Battle
5.Fixed the display issue of superscript in the training interface
6.Fixed the display issue of the number of troops on the square of iOS version
7.Fixed the crash issue of the arena battle animation.

3.Fixed the problem of being unable to advance some enablers in the Survival Battle
